mutants.original_line: sentence1 = ''.join(char.lower() for char in sentence1 if char.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: sentence1 = 'MUTATED'.join((char.lower() for char in sentence1 if char.isalpha()))

mutants.mutated_line: sentence2 = 'MUTATED'.join((char.lower() for char in sentence2 if char.isalpha()))
